Baldwin Condos & Penthouses offers 194 contemporary and spacious units located in an oasis of tranquility in Dollard-des-Ormeaux. Residents have free access to a private Wi-Fi connection in their unit and a public network in all common areas. The condos and penthouses have a large private balcony or terrace of up to 725 square feet. Prestigious common areas will complete this large-scale project including: rooftop terraces with a swim spa and relaxation area, multifunctional room, indoor gym, outdoor training space and equipment and much more.

 

This modern and intimate residential project is just five minutes from the future REM station and close to all services and amenities, including the Fairview Pointe-Claire shopping centre and several neighborhood restaurants.

name: Théâtre Snowdon Condominiums
descr:
• 62 units | 6 stories and a mezzanine level |

  • Studios, lofts, 1 to 2 bedrooms |

  • 376 to 1,295 square feet |

  • In construction |

  • Delivery Spring 2022 |

 

Snowdon Théâtre is a condominiums project established in a building of great heritage value. Built in 1936, the building once housed the Snowdon Theatre, an Art Deco-style cinema. The original facade of the building has been preserved, as well as the sign and the marquee which have been restored. Located in the Côte-des-Neiges – Notre-Dame-de-Grâce district, the project offers 62 units that tie together two eras on the stylistic, artistic and functional levels. Nearby are several restaurants, shops and the must-see Mount-Royal Park, which is about ten minutes away!

 

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Centralized hot water included
  • Appliances included

  • Outdoor living room with rooftop terrace

  • Interior spaces for bikes
  • Concrete structure and 8,5 inch exposed concrete ceiling 

  • Quartz countertop and ceramic backsplash

  • Engineered flooring

  • Wall-mounted air conditioning 

 

GOOD TO KNOW

  • Camera surveillance system
  • Intelligent opening system

  • Possibility of storage space (locker)

  • Elegant Art deco style decorated lobby with original period statues

  • Garbage chute and recycling room

  • Project covered by the ACQ Guarantee Plan

Located in LaSalle, Fleming sur le Parc offers a lifestyle perfectly balanced between nature and urbanity just a few meters from Angrignon Park, one of the most magnificent urban parks in Quebec. It offers a flourishing environment of recreation and activities, with its 100 hectares of greenery, lakes and trails.

Dalia is a new condo and townhouse project designed on a human scale and strategically positioned in the Saint-Laurent district, close to major highways and services. The spacious condos are available in one to three bedroom units with models including a living room or an office space, facilitating teleworking. Townhouses are available in three to five bedroom models and come with a rear terrace or a roof deck, smart office space and a garage.

 

All units have full-height windows, majestic ceilings, a choice of exceptional kitchen designs, a large balcony or terrace and high-end finishes. Residents benefit from direct access, via the bicycle and pedestrian path, to the future Royalmount megaproject, the largest of its kind in Quebec with over 200 stores, office space, movie theaters, restaurants, and flagship businesses. A few steps away are also the Du Collège metro station and the Cité Midtown public park, easily accessible by the bike path.

The project offers a unique lifestyle, including green walkways, vegetable and flower gardens, pergolas and a rooftop swimming pool. The units, equipped with state-of-the-art appliances, smart thermostats and high-end finishes ensure unparalleled comfort.

name: Ateliers Héritage
descr:
• 36 units | 5 floors |

  • Studios, 1 to 2 bedrooms |

  • Phase 4 “Heritage” in pre-launch |

 

Ateliers Castelnau is a new project that was born at the turn of the year 2017. Unique in its kind, the condominium project will emerge on de Castelnau Street, straddling the Mile-End and Parc-Extension districts, a few strides from Little Italy and Villeray. Ateliers Castelnau is part of a historic district that is constantly renewing itself. It is quickly becoming a trendy and contemporary environment where creativity and freedom are an honored mixture. Ateliers Castelnau project wishes to respect the historical character of this neighbourhood, now affectionately known as the Mile-Ex, and thus develops a human-scale architecture that will integrate into the surrounding environment.

 

Héritage is the fourth and final phase of the Ateliers Castelnau project. It promises the redevelopment of a historic building erected in 1926 that housed workshops for shoemaking, carpentry, weaving, embroidery, painting and more. It is in homage to these artisans that Heritage has integrated a workshop space, to preserve the creative and artisanal side that has marked the history of the district. The building offers warm, bright and ergonomic units with many choices of finishes as well as a roof terrace, indoor parking, a bike workshop and a multifunctional aera.

name: Carter sur le Parc
descr:
Carter sur le Parc is a condo rental project located just across from Jarry Park in Montreal. The building boasts wide fenestration onto a breathtaking view of the park facing west, while the private garden of Carter is seen facing east. One to three-bedroom units are offered in addition to six luxurious penthouses.

 

The condo development is located in the inimitable district of Little Italy. This neighborhood, once the jewel of proud Italian immigrants, has revealed itself to all Montrealers and is now the most popular neighborhoods in the metropolitan area. The neighborhood life found there has an undeniable attraction. The many shops and attractions make it a great place to live. The must-see Marché Jean-Talon, the Milano Market, Jarry Park, and the IGA Stadium for tennis fans, as well as the many local trattoria and pizzerias that lure the residents of the area.

 

The access to the neighborhood is particularly simple since the Jean-Talon metro station and the train intersect there. The neighborhood is woven of several bike paths, while a wide network of shops is within walking distance.

descr:
• 5 buildings in total |
  • 24 units per building | 4 stories |
  • 1 to 3 bedrooms |
  • 747 to 1173 SqFt |
  • Phase 3 now for sale |

 

Havre des pins is an innovative co-op condo project located in the McCrea Plateau in Sherbrooke city. The first phase has just been launched.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Wood and concrete structure
  • Optimized soundproofing
  • Large windows
  • Balcony in each unit  

 

DESCRIPTION

Havre des Pins is developed in the McCrea Plateau, in Sherbrooke city, a new neighbourhood focused on sustainable development. Keeping in mind the surrounding environment and the nature of the terrain, the five buildings are settled in a wonderful wooded area. The sight’s various spaces are accessible via a pedestrian path that even provides a distinct access to André-Viger Park.

 

In addition to an exceptional quality of life, Havre des Pins also offers its own unique way of living. This innovative co-op condo formula allows those seeking to own a condo to also live harmoniously in respect of the values of the cooperative movement; individual and collective commitment, collaboration and solidarity, to name a few. Havre des Pins is a village onto itself, a place where living within a neighbourhood of people who share your values and co-op spirit feels good.

 

With the financial participation of the Fondation pour le Développement de l’Habitation coopérative du Québec (FDHACQ) and developed without intermediaries, Havre des Pins makes ownership accessible. Havre des Pins is the first cooperative housing project in Québec while in Europe, this concept represents 20% of their housings.

name: Cité Angus II
descr:
• 88 units | 6 stories |
  • 1 to 3 bedrooms |
  • 637 to 1,300 square feet |

 

Cité Angus II is an eco-friendly and elegant condo concept located in the heart of Montréal’s Rosemont district. This real estate project with its unique characteristics offers 88 units accessible via a monumental spiral staircase. Every unit features and abundance of natural lighting and a spectacular view of nature and the city. The is eco-building is part of a brand-new sustainable neighbourhood with numerous green spaces.  

  

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Spacious units, up to 3 bedrooms
  • Large fenestration
  • Concrete structure 
  • Monumental outdoor staircase
  • Balcony, terraces ranging from 100 to 650 sq. ft. 
  • Indoor parking for cars and bicycles
  • LEED-ND Platinum certified eco-neighbourhood facing Jean-Duceppe park
  • 25% green spaces and pedestrian main street

 

DESCRIPTION

Technopôle Angus—it’s so much more than a neighbourhood—it’s an urban village in the making. Cité Angus offers families serene, urban living. Featuring superb common areas and lots of green spaces, Cité Angus offers a safe and comfortable space for both young and old. Numerous businesses and services are accessible on foot—accentuating its community feel. A project that perfectly suits Rosemont-La Petite-Patrie: trendy and family oriented.   

 

GOOD TO KNOW

Cité Angus is Quebec’s first LEED-ND Platinum certified mixed-use green neighbourhood. Facing Jean-Duceppe park, this eco-neighbourhood takes on an urban-village feel; businesses and residents share a dynamic, eco-friendly and welcoming living space inspired by the latest in sustainable and environmental urbanism strategies. The site features two bike paths, a BIXI station, Communauto carsharing, eight electric vehicle charging stations and underground parking. 

 

STEPS AWAY

This exceptional Technopôle Angus community is in the heart of the vibrant Rosemont-La Petite-Patrie neighbourhood.  An ideal location for residents to quickly access key sights: Mount Royal Park, Downtown, the Olympic Park, etc. Runners, yogis and cyclists will love the nearby parks—Jean-Duceppe, Maisonneuve and du Pélican. And foodies will relish the butcher shops, cheese shops and numerous quaint restaurants: Café Station W, Magnolia, Mamie Clafoutis, Pizzéria no.900 and, for some fine dining, Hoogan et Beaufort, among Quebec’s top restaurants. 

 

SALES OFFICE 

2600, rue William-Tremblay, #118

name: O Cartier
descr:
O Cartier condominiums: it's all about location.

There’s an old saying among real estate investors: only three things matter when you’re buying a property: location, location, and location. When it comes to a riverside location in Laval with quick access to downtown Montreal, the O Cartier Condominiums have the location requirement completely covered.
The property is at the foot of Pont Viau, on the banks of the Rivière des Prairies and steps away from Cartier métro station, that gives you instant access to downtown Montreal.
The convenient yet beautiful location of the O Cartier condominiums, combined with the building’s exceptional features and finishes, put these suites far above the competition in the Montreal/Laval area

Characteristics and Services
• Reinforced concrete structure with floor to ceiling windows maximizing natural light
• Large terraces and/or balconies with breath-taking view overlooking the river and Montreal
• Up to (9) feet high ceilings for condo units and up to (11) feet ceilings for Penthouses
• Heated pool and ultra modern gym area
• Landscaped and furnished terrace near and around pool
• Lobby with reception service and security
• Green space with waterfront - bicycle path
• Furnished condo available for guests
• Private laundry services (drop-off mornings and pick-up evenings)
• Car wash service on site
• Parking with charging outlets for electrical cars
• Roof with ecological drainage system
• Central boiler system for hot water supply
• Solar panels on exterior walls used to reduce heating costs
• Security system and surveillance cameras
• Engineered wood flooring and ceramic tiling throughout units
• Italian imported and custom designed kitchen and vanity cabinetry by “SCAVOLINI”
• Quartz or granite counter tops in both kitchens and bathrooms
• Comfort zone with independent A.C. control system in each condo
• Two storey Penthouses with private terraces

The architectural signature is contemporary in nature,  while being integrated harmoniously with surrounding projects.

 

Neighborhood

Trails and bike paths take you to the playgrounds and surrounding parks. The outdoor pool, gym and urban cottage are designed so that residents can enjoy them on carefree summer days.

 

Well thought out spaces

The generous fenestration of the houses allows a bright living environment, open to nature. Laminate and ceramic wood floors, Zen-style moldings and contemporary finishes create a calm and serene environment.

name: Union sur le Parc
descr:
Union Park is offering you the opportunity to own a piece of one of downtown Montreal’s rare green spaces, all while enjoying the benefits of a lively neighborhood.

 

UNITS

  • Phase 1 : 188 units | 20 stories - 100% sold
  • Studios, 1 to 4 bedrooms condos, town houses        
  • Occupancy :  Fall 2019
  • Phase 2 : 166 units | 20 stories
  • Studios, 1 to 4 bedrooms condos, townhouses - 3 bedroom units available    
  • Occupancy :  Winter 2020

 

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Urban chalet overlooking Montreal  with a bookable space  for private events

  • Two rooftop terraces with outdoor swimming pools,  relaxation and BBQ areas

  • Craftroom featuring a commercial kitchen area and large tables for creative projects or family events. Bookable for private events

  • 2,500 square feet urban agriculture space with gardening plots for residents to grow vegetables, herbs and small fruits

  • Two storey, 6,800+ square feet  fitness centre with large windows overlooking a landscaped green space

  • Spa area next to fitness centre, featuring indoor swimming pool, hot tub, steam room and sauna

  • Two Hotel-Boutique style lobbies with working spaces, reading roomes and bookable conference room 

  • Units with optimised storage spaces; adjustable number of rooms in certain units

  • Uninterrupted 360 degree views of downtown, Mount Royal, and SouthShore Montreal

  • Over 30 000 pi2  of green spaces

  • Condos between 317 ft2 and 1,667 square feet

  • Parking starting at $43 000 (before taxes)

  • Condo fees: $0.29 / ft2 / month

 

DESCRIPTION
Located in Shaughnessy Village,  a 6 minutes walk away from the Atwater metro, this project is just step away from the Sainte-Catherine Street's stores and  some of the city’s best known institutions, such as the Canadian Centre for Architecture, Concordia University, Dawson  and Lasalle Colleges. Prével is proud to be back in the neighborhood following  the success of S sur le Square in 2014 and Le Seville in 2011.

Both phases of the Union Park project are characterised by huge greenspaces, optimised living areas, numerous common areas and units offering views of Mount-Royal, the downtown skyline and the Montreal's South Shore

name: Le Nordelec
descr:
Former factory built in 1913, the Nordelec is a unique Montreal real estate project. Indeed, the historical building has undergone a rejuvenation and is now a luxurious real estate complex where contemporary condos blend with character lofts. The post-industrial architecture of the early 20th century is celebrated as the addition of the condo building has been refined in harmony with the historical style of the building. Their design offers space and charm and an open feel with abundant fenestration.

 

The project is on the southern edge of the Lachine Canal, allowing easy access to the reviving Griffintown neighbourhood, while living off the canal banks and cycling path. Several units boast a panoramic view of downtown Montreal and the Canal.

 

The Nordelec offers life in a trendy environment, full of culture and open to the nature of the park of the Lachine Canal. The units of the housing project have a common huge rooftop terrace, a swimming pool, a gym and a lounge, all with a prestigious architectural imprint.

 

 

GOOD TO KNOW

  • Three types of dwelling, condos, lofts and penthouse
  • Ceilings up to 14 feet high for lofts
  • 9 foot high ceilings for condos
  • Outdoor pool
  • Terraces at the roof
  • Urban living room with fireplace
  • Fitness Room

 

A FEW STEPS

  • Neighbourhood Griffintown
  • Lachine Canal Park
  • Access to Victoria Bridge in two minutes
  • Costco

name: Bel Air Tremblant
descr:
Bel Air Tremblant is a new real estate project combining residential and resort lodging. Located in Mont-Tremblant, just minutes from the ski resort, the development offers original designed single family homes and environmentally friendly mini lofts. Bel Air offers a new style of living with its 543 acres of land and the concept of vacation accommodation, which provides a lifestyle that resembles resorts.

 

Living at Bel Air Tremblant means living just 8 minutes from the renowned Tremblant ski resort, the jewel of eastern North America for winter sports and varied summer activities. Surrounded by nature and green space, the real estate project offers a living community that will regroup around the heart of the village, the Clubhouse and its swimming pool. A real leisure centre where modern equipment and variety of attractions will delight young people from 7 to 77 years old.

 

GOOD TO KNOW

PURCHASE AND / OR RENTAL

 

Several lots with panoramic views are available for the construction of your new home. Before making your purchase or to enjoy a great weekend in the wonderful complex of Bel Air Tremblant, several houses are offered for rent. Tenants have access to common areas as well as the Clubhouse for the rental period.

descr:
The Groupe 4M offers single houses of three floors, comprising from three to four bedrooms. This project, including units from $334 000 to $450 000 (plus taxes), is built as a part of the Urbanova development in Terrebonne.

 

The houses are all south-oriented to allow an intelligent and responsible energy consumption. Equipped with a natural gas heating system as well as air conditioning, the single houses of the Groupe 4M are the perfect combination of urban life and nature's comfort. Surrounded with bike paths, pedestrian trails, and watercourses, each house allows to enjoy the serene and calm environment thanks to the generous windows letting in natural lighting. 

 

The Groupe 4M is a family business known to be close to their clients and attentive to their needs, which is why the future homeowners are part of the process from the start to make sure they get a comfortable and functional result, adapted to their lifestyle. Choosing the Groupe 4M means to choose complicity, support, and well-being.

• Prestigious single-family homes of contemporary and avant-garde style
• Multiple models available and customizable for your dream home

• Veridis is a large residential project located in the heart of the Auteuil section of Laval
• A neighbourhood that features numerous green spaces, expansive homesites and homes of decidedly modern architecture
• Numerous parks, bike and walking paths for outdoor lovers
• A choice neighbourhood, ideally located between Montreal and the Laurentians

For further information, please contact our home consultant, Juliana Copan, by phone (450 963-8300 ext. 555), mobile (514 863-2555) or e-mail (jcopan@voyer.ca).

Fraternité-sur-Lac offers many types of high-quality homes:
• The Spahaus and Trihaus contemporary chalets are comprised of 21 and 10 luxury chalets, respectively.
• The Suites-sur-Lac offer 69 modern units built on the shores of Lac Supérieur.
• The Refuge, The Nordic and The Escapade offer three types of log cabins for those seeking upscale comfort.

A prestigious location adjacent “Le Square Nordet” park and a network of walking paths and bike paths that will connect future owners to numerous parks and amenities located within Bois-Franc including the largest natural park in the Project covering an area in excess of 1,150,000 square feet located a short walking distance away.

descr:

This pioneering product, better known in Europe, is becoming increasingly popular because the wood is a renewable material, which gives it a distinct edge in sustainable construction.

The development is close to all amenities, park, school, shop, bike paths and a few minutes walk from the Bois-Franc train station. An environment in which to live.

Be the first to be informed and invited to our launch event, scheduled in a few weeks by contacting Mina or by visiting us at our pavilion sales.

*Taxes included.

UNITS

The first phase, 16-storeys high, 115 units ranging from 553 to 1062 square feet are offered. The second phase will have only three units arranged over four floors. Units of one and two rooms are available as well as loft-style studios. Feng Shui-style condominiums are also available for buyers.

  • Training room overlooking the pool

Located in the city center means having quick access to the Lachine Canal, to Mount Royal and all their attractions.

Villas and condos

An ideal concept for those who are retired and semi-retired, the villas and condos of Villas des Clos Prévostois are administered like a private club that offers its members an incredible amount of advantages and services.

For those who love nature, the P'tit Train du Nord trail passes close to the site, allowing you to go on splendid bike rides during summer, to do cross-country skiing during winter, and take beautiful walks all year long.

Built according to superior quality standards, the charming villas of this project are located on magnificent woodland lots. These stylish residences are perfect for those who want to benefit from the advantages of the project, while having their own private land.

name: Ateliers Héritage
descr:
• 36 units | 5 floors |

  • Studios, 1 to 2 bedrooms |

  • Phase 4 “Heritage” in pre-launch |

 

Ateliers Castelnau is a new project that was born at the turn of the year 2017. Unique in its kind, the condominium project will emerge on de Castelnau Street, straddling the Mile-End and Parc-Extension districts, a few strides from Little Italy and Villeray. Ateliers Castelnau is part of a historic district that is constantly renewing itself. It is quickly becoming a trendy and contemporary environment where creativity and freedom are an honored mixture. Ateliers Castelnau project wishes to respect the historical character of this neighbourhood, now affectionately known as the Mile-Ex, and thus develops a human-scale architecture that will integrate into the surrounding environment.

 

Héritage is the fourth and final phase of the Ateliers Castelnau project. It promises the redevelopment of a historic building erected in 1926 that housed workshops for shoemaking, carpentry, weaving, embroidery, painting and more. It is in homage to these artisans that Heritage has integrated a workshop space, to preserve the creative and artisanal side that has marked the history of the district. The building offers warm, bright and ergonomic units with many choices of finishes as well as a roof terrace, indoor parking, a bike workshop and a multifunctional aera.

1 Square Phillips Penthouses & Condos will be the highest residential tower in the sky of Montreal. Indeed, the 61 floors of this unique real estate project will majestically overhang the sky of the metropolis.

 

Located right in the heart of the city, a stone's throw from Montreal's main commercial artery, the legendary Rue Sainte-Catherine. 1 Phillips Square will offer an urban and active lifestyle, in the heart of the vibrant life offered by the center of Montreal. The condo complex will offer unique views of the city and the river.

descr:

Joia Griffintown offers magnificent rental units in the heart of Griffintown, near the Lachine Canal and downtown Montreal. The project offers units with high-end finishes and impressive amenities including a fully equipped gym, a luxurious lounge and a large roof terrace with running track, urban vegetable gardens, barbecues and heated floor to enjoy it all year round.
 

Griffintown offer a vast artistic scene, avant-garde new architecture and gourmet restaurants. A bicycle path and a pedestrian path allow you to follow the iconic Lachine Canal, which is surrounded by parks and greenery.

name: YUL 2 Condominiums
descr:
• 2 tours | 874 units | 38 stories |
  • 1 to 3 bedrooms, studios, penthouses, townhouses |
  • From 298 to 1,689 SqFt |

YUL is a prestigious condominium project located in downtown Montreal. The bold condo towers in staggered blocks and the 17 luxurious townhouses will be the perfect embodiment of Montreal's urban life. With its exceptional unobstructed view, YUL is a rarity in the Montreal real estate landscape.

Located at the crossroads of the vibrant Quartier des spectacles and Griffintown, YUL emerges on two towers of 38 spectacular storeys that overlook a tranquil 23,000 square foot private garden and Armani / Casa furnished leisure areas. Obviously, Brivia Group, promoter of YUL, and Menkes Shooner Dagenais LeTourneux, award-winning visionary architects, have seen big.

Erected on the very site of construction of the daring blocks of blocks and luxurious town houses of the project, the YUL Presentation Center is an invitation to live today the YUL of tomorrow in a beautiful glass space that favors perfection in the every detail.

 

IMPORTANT CASHBACK INCENTIVES

name: Carter sur le Parc
descr:
Carter sur le Parc is a condo rental project located just across from Jarry Park in Montreal. The building boasts wide fenestration onto a breathtaking view of the park facing west, while the private garden of Carter is seen facing east. One to three-bedroom units are offered in addition to six luxurious penthouses.

 

The condo development is located in the inimitable district of Little Italy. This neighborhood, once the jewel of proud Italian immigrants, has revealed itself to all Montrealers and is now the most popular neighborhoods in the metropolitan area. The neighborhood life found there has an undeniable attraction. The many shops and attractions make it a great place to live. The must-see Marché Jean-Talon, the Milano Market, Jarry Park, and the IGA Stadium for tennis fans, as well as the many local trattoria and pizzerias that lure the residents of the area.

 

The access to the neighborhood is particularly simple since the Jean-Talon metro station and the train intersect there. The neighborhood is woven of several bike paths, while a wide network of shops is within walking distance.

descr:
• 5 buildings in total |
  • 24 units per building | 4 stories |
  • 1 to 3 bedrooms |
  • 747 to 1173 SqFt |
  • Phase 3 now for sale |

 

Havre des pins is an innovative co-op condo project located in the McCrea Plateau in Sherbrooke city. The first phase has just been launched.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Wood and concrete structure
  • Optimized soundproofing
  • Large windows
  • Balcony in each unit  

 

DESCRIPTION

Havre des Pins is developed in the McCrea Plateau, in Sherbrooke city, a new neighbourhood focused on sustainable development. Keeping in mind the surrounding environment and the nature of the terrain, the five buildings are settled in a wonderful wooded area. The sight’s various spaces are accessible via a pedestrian path that even provides a distinct access to André-Viger Park.

 

In addition to an exceptional quality of life, Havre des Pins also offers its own unique way of living. This innovative co-op condo formula allows those seeking to own a condo to also live harmoniously in respect of the values of the cooperative movement; individual and collective commitment, collaboration and solidarity, to name a few. Havre des Pins is a village onto itself, a place where living within a neighbourhood of people who share your values and co-op spirit feels good.

 

With the financial participation of the Fondation pour le Développement de l’Habitation coopérative du Québec (FDHACQ) and developed without intermediaries, Havre des Pins makes ownership accessible. Havre des Pins is the first cooperative housing project in Québec while in Europe, this concept represents 20% of their housings.

name: Cité Angus II
descr:
• 88 units | 6 stories |
  • 1 to 3 bedrooms |
  • 637 to 1,300 square feet |

 

Cité Angus II is an eco-friendly and elegant condo concept located in the heart of Montréal’s Rosemont district. This real estate project with its unique characteristics offers 88 units accessible via a monumental spiral staircase. Every unit features and abundance of natural lighting and a spectacular view of nature and the city. The is eco-building is part of a brand-new sustainable neighbourhood with numerous green spaces.  

  

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Spacious units, up to 3 bedrooms
  • Large fenestration
  • Concrete structure 
  • Monumental outdoor staircase
  • Balcony, terraces ranging from 100 to 650 sq. ft. 
  • Indoor parking for cars and bicycles
  • LEED-ND Platinum certified eco-neighbourhood facing Jean-Duceppe park
  • 25% green spaces and pedestrian main street

 

DESCRIPTION

Technopôle Angus—it’s so much more than a neighbourhood—it’s an urban village in the making. Cité Angus offers families serene, urban living. Featuring superb common areas and lots of green spaces, Cité Angus offers a safe and comfortable space for both young and old. Numerous businesses and services are accessible on foot—accentuating its community feel. A project that perfectly suits Rosemont-La Petite-Patrie: trendy and family oriented.   

 

GOOD TO KNOW

Cité Angus is Quebec’s first LEED-ND Platinum certified mixed-use green neighbourhood. Facing Jean-Duceppe park, this eco-neighbourhood takes on an urban-village feel; businesses and residents share a dynamic, eco-friendly and welcoming living space inspired by the latest in sustainable and environmental urbanism strategies. The site features two bike paths, a BIXI station, Communauto carsharing, eight electric vehicle charging stations and underground parking. 

 

STEPS AWAY

This exceptional Technopôle Angus community is in the heart of the vibrant Rosemont-La Petite-Patrie neighbourhood.  An ideal location for residents to quickly access key sights: Mount Royal Park, Downtown, the Olympic Park, etc. Runners, yogis and cyclists will love the nearby parks—Jean-Duceppe, Maisonneuve and du Pélican. And foodies will relish the butcher shops, cheese shops and numerous quaint restaurants: Café Station W, Magnolia, Mamie Clafoutis, Pizzéria no.900 and, for some fine dining, Hoogan et Beaufort, among Quebec’s top restaurants. 

 

SALES OFFICE 

2600, rue William-Tremblay, #118

name: O Cartier
descr:
O Cartier condominiums: it's all about location.

There’s an old saying among real estate investors: only three things matter when you’re buying a property: location, location, and location. When it comes to a riverside location in Laval with quick access to downtown Montreal, the O Cartier Condominiums have the location requirement completely covered.
The property is at the foot of Pont Viau, on the banks of the Rivière des Prairies and steps away from Cartier métro station, that gives you instant access to downtown Montreal.
The convenient yet beautiful location of the O Cartier condominiums, combined with the building’s exceptional features and finishes, put these suites far above the competition in the Montreal/Laval area

Characteristics and Services
• Reinforced concrete structure with floor to ceiling windows maximizing natural light
• Large terraces and/or balconies with breath-taking view overlooking the river and Montreal
• Up to (9) feet high ceilings for condo units and up to (11) feet ceilings for Penthouses
• Heated pool and ultra modern gym area
• Landscaped and furnished terrace near and around pool
• Lobby with reception service and security
• Green space with waterfront - bicycle path
• Furnished condo available for guests
• Private laundry services (drop-off mornings and pick-up evenings)
• Car wash service on site
• Parking with charging outlets for electrical cars
• Roof with ecological drainage system
• Central boiler system for hot water supply
• Solar panels on exterior walls used to reduce heating costs
• Security system and surveillance cameras
• Engineered wood flooring and ceramic tiling throughout units
• Italian imported and custom designed kitchen and vanity cabinetry by “SCAVOLINI”
• Quartz or granite counter tops in both kitchens and bathrooms
• Comfort zone with independent A.C. control system in each condo
• Two storey Penthouses with private terraces

descr:

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Urban chalet overlooking Montreal  with a bookable space  for private events

  • Two rooftop terraces with outdoor swimming pools,  relaxation and BBQ areas

  • Craftroom featuring a commercial kitchen area and large tables for creative projects or family events. Bookable for private events

  • 2,500 square feet urban agriculture space with gardening plots for residents to grow vegetables, herbs and small fruits

  • Two storey, 6,800+ square feet  fitness centre with large windows overlooking a landscaped green space

  • Spa area next to fitness centre, featuring indoor swimming pool, hot tub, steam room and sauna

  • Two Hotel-Boutique style lobbies with working spaces, reading roomes and bookable conference room 

  • Units with optimised storage spaces; adjustable number of rooms in certain units

  • Uninterrupted 360 degree views of downtown, Mount Royal, and SouthShore Montreal

  • Over 30 000 pi2  of green spaces

  • Condos between 317 ft2 and 1,667 square feet

  • Parking starting at $43 000 (before taxes)

  • Condo fees: $0.29 / ft2 / month

 

DESCRIPTION
Located in Shaughnessy Village,  a 6 minutes walk away from the Atwater metro, this project is just step away from the Sainte-Catherine Street's stores and  some of the city’s best known institutions, such as the Canadian Centre for Architecture, Concordia University, Dawson  and Lasalle Colleges. Prével is proud to be back in the neighborhood following  the success of S sur le Square in 2014 and Le Seville in 2011.

Both phases of the Union Park project are characterised by huge greenspaces, optimised living areas, numerous common areas and units offering views of Mount-Royal, the downtown skyline and the Montreal's South Shore

name: Le Nordelec
descr:
Former factory built in 1913, the Nordelec is a unique Montreal real estate project. Indeed, the historical building has undergone a rejuvenation and is now a luxurious real estate complex where contemporary condos blend with character lofts. The post-industrial architecture of the early 20th century is celebrated as the addition of the condo building has been refined in harmony with the historical style of the building. Their design offers space and charm and an open feel with abundant fenestration.

 

The project is on the southern edge of the Lachine Canal, allowing easy access to the reviving Griffintown neighbourhood, while living off the canal banks and cycling path. Several units boast a panoramic view of downtown Montreal and the Canal.

 

The Nordelec offers life in a trendy environment, full of culture and open to the nature of the park of the Lachine Canal. The units of the housing project have a common huge rooftop terrace, a swimming pool, a gym and a lounge, all with a prestigious architectural imprint.

 

 

GOOD TO KNOW

descr:
Bel Air Tremblant is a new real estate project combining residential and resort lodging. Located in Mont-Tremblant, just minutes from the ski resort, the development offers original designed single family homes and environmentally friendly mini lofts. Bel Air offers a new style of living with its 543 acres of land and the concept of vacation accommodation, which provides a lifestyle that resembles resorts.

 

Living at Bel Air Tremblant means living just 8 minutes from the renowned Tremblant ski resort, the jewel of eastern North America for winter sports and varied summer activities. Surrounded by nature and green space, the real estate project offers a living community that will regroup around the heart of the village, the Clubhouse and its swimming pool. A real leisure centre where modern equipment and variety of attractions will delight young people from 7 to 77 years old.

name: Urbanova - Groupe 4M
descr:
The Groupe 4M offers single houses of three floors, comprising from three to four bedrooms. This project, including units from $334 000 to $450 000 (plus taxes), is built as a part of the Urbanova development in Terrebonne.

 

The houses are all south-oriented to allow an intelligent and responsible energy consumption. Equipped with a natural gas heating system as well as air conditioning, the single houses of the Groupe 4M are the perfect combination of urban life and nature's comfort. Surrounded with bike paths, pedestrian trails, and watercourses, each house allows to enjoy the serene and calm environment thanks to the generous windows letting in natural lighting. 

 

The Groupe 4M is a family business known to be close to their clients and attentive to their needs, which is why the future homeowners are part of the process from the start to make sure they get a comfortable and functional result, adapted to their lifestyle. Choosing the Groupe 4M means to choose complicity, support, and well-being.

descr:
La Catherine is a new condominium project consisting of two phases in the Montreal downtown area. Located in one of the most attractive districts of the city, La Catherine offers a lifestyle where all services are nearby. The urban, contemporary buildings fit perfectly in this neighbourhood.

UNITS

The first phase, 16-storeys high, 115 units ranging from 553 to 1062 square feet are offered. The second phase will have only three units arranged over four floors. Units of one and two rooms are available as well as loft-style studios. Feng Shui-style condominiums are also available for buyers.

In addition to living in a well arranged unit, residents of La Catherine condominiums will have access to several common areas.

 

  • Training room overlooking the pool
  • Outdoor pool
  • Courtyard
  • Multipurpose room and a common lounge
  • Indoor parking
  • Security 24/7



NEIGHBORHOOD
Located on one of the most vibrant and diverse corridors of Montreal, La Catherine condos are just steps from Concordia University, Lasalle College and several other educational institutions. Grocery stores, pharmacies, entertainment, shopping, hospitals, nurseries and shops of all kinds are within walking distance. Located in the city center means having quick access to the Lachine Canal, to Mount Royal and all their attractions.

PRICE
Studio: $238,000
1 bedroom: $290,000
2 bedrooms: $435,000

DELIVERY
The project is currently 70% sold and construction has already begun for Jun 2017 occupancy.

name: Angus Avenue du Mont-Royal
descr:
Condos Angus, Mont-Royal Avenue is a residential project located in the Rosemont area, in the heart of the Angus Shop. This new district revolves around the former "shop angus", real factories of the industrial era. Since their closure, renovation and rehabilitation have given a boost to the sector, several real estate projects have been grafted there, creating a real hamlet where neighbourhood life is at its best.

 

The 42-unit condominium project (concrete structure) consists of six floors and comprises seven units per floor. The architecture is sober while the layout allows superb views of the city. The design of the units offers refinement and allows customization to its taste.

 

All units have air conditioning, storage locker and indoor parking, prices include taxes.

 

GOOD TO KNOW
Neighborhood in effervescence
Concrete Construction

A FEW STEPS

name: Les Clos Prévostois
descr:
Les Clos Prévostois is a prestigious project in Prévost, in the Laurentians, It is located close to Saint-Sauveur and is just a few steps from downtown Saint-Jérôme and all the amenities of the town. It features bungalows with garages, luxury condos with elevators and garages, and three types of triplex models.

Villas and condos

An ideal concept for those who are retired and semi-retired, the villas and condos of Villas des Clos Prévostois are administered like a private club that offers its members an incredible amount of advantages and services.

These advantages include the reassuring presence of security guards, who safeguard the well-being of the residents and do maintenance on the premises. This will free you from all the maintenance work related to a property, allowing you to devote your time to hobbies and fun activities. Accordingly, the project will soon include a community centre with a grand hall, an exercise room and a heated outdoor pool.

For those who love nature, the P'tit Train du Nord trail passes close to the site, allowing you to go on splendid bike rides during summer, to do cross-country skiing during winter, and take beautiful walks all year long.

Built according to superior quality standards, the charming villas of this project are located on magnificent woodland lots. These stylish residences are perfect for those who want to benefit from the advantages of the project, while having their own private land.

As for the condos, the inside of the units offers you all the luxury and comfort you are looking for, and the buildings have elevators and a garage.

The project offers a wide variety of different contemporary-inspired townhouses equipped with two or three bedrooms. Many advantages come with this choice of housing, including rigorous soundproofing, private backyard, generous fenestration, and a garage. 

 

The Groupe Mathieu, 2005 recipient of the APCHQ's Diamond palm, the most prestigious award in the industry, is known for the excellence of its services since 35 years. The kitchen is designed in a very functional way.The beautiful and very practical kitchen counter will inspire you to make new dishes and enjoy them with your family and friends.
The elegant bathroom with ceramic shower will bring warmth and relaxation you can enjoy at last.
The other practical aspect of the bathroom is that there is a laundry room directly attached to it.The need for storage space is often overlooked but project LES QUATRE thought about this too.They offer you three storage spaces:one inside your condo,one on the terrace and one in the garage.

Starting from $237,900 taxes incluses.

The city of Sainte-Sophie has plenty to offer to future home owners: new library, new daycare,schools, beautiful parks, golf courses, equestrian centers,snowmobile and ski trails.

The location of the project gives you access to all important facilities:grocery stores, pharmacy, medical clinic, primary school, several restaurants,gas stations, new daycare soon and much more.

Presently, LES JARDIN DU RUISSEAU is the only residential development in the city that includes all the infrastructures (sanitary sewers, water, asphalt,street curbs, street lights…) in the price of your new home. You will equally benefit from the lowest tax rates in the region. The project is also served by Bell Canada with its newest technologies (fiber optic) that offers you a wide range of services.

The main entrance of LES JARDIN DU RUISSEAU distinguishes its new development from its competition in keeping it chic, very private, peaceful and safe for the future owners and their families.
